name: DNB Bank ASA
bossPosition: Head of Corporate Responsibility & Public Affairs
goal: DNB is Norway's largest financial services group and one of the largest in the Nordic region in terms of market capitalisation. We offer a full range of financial services, including loans, savings, advisory services, insurance and pension products for retail and corporate customers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: As a financial institution with a global scope and an ambitious technology strategy, DNB is heavily impacted by regulations adopted at the EU level, spanning both banking supervision and capital market regulations as well as digital regulations. Accordingly, DNB  monitors upcoming and ongoing legislative initiatives, notably within the realm of financial services, sustainability and the digital economy.
